canvas.component.copied.notes: Published when a component is copied to clipboard

canvas.component.pasted.notes: Published when a component is pasted from clipboard

canvas.component.select.svg-node.changed.notes: Published when SVG node selection changes

canvas.component.select.requested.notes: Published when component selection is requested

canvas.component.select.svg-node.request.notes: Published when SVG node selection is requested

canvas.component.created.notes: Published when a component is created on the canvas

canvas.component.create.requested.notes: Published when component creation is requested

canvas.component.deleted.notes: Published when a component is deleted from the canvas

canvas.component.deselection.changed.notes: Published when component deselection state changes

canvas.component.selection.changed.notes: Published when component selection state changes

canvas.component.drag.start.notes: Published when component drag operation starts

canvas.component.drag.end.notes: Published when component drag operation ends

canvas.component.import.requested.notes: Published when component import is requested

canvas.component.import.completed.notes: Published when component import is completed

canvas.component.update.svg-node.request.notes: Published when SVG node update is requested

react.component.mounted.notes: Published when a React component is successfully mounted on the canvas

react.component.error.notes: Published when a React component fails to compile or render

canvas.component.selections.cleared.notes: Published when all component selections are cleared. This is a notify-only topic to avoid deselect loops.
